thread.title: Too Faced’s new glitter rainbow palette proves that you can never have too much sparkle
thread.title_full: Too Faced’s new glitter rainbow palette proves that you can never have too much sparkle

author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
title: Too Faced’s new glitter rainbow palette proves that you can never have too much sparkle
text:
Too Faced’s new glitter rainbow palette proves that you can never have too much sparkle Jerrod Blandino seems to believe that his mission in life is to give beauty lovers the world over heart attacks because he just will not stop with the incredible behind-the-scenes looks and sneak peeks! His latest is the most glorious look at Too Faced’s rainbow-hued upcoming glitter palette , and we might as well just hand over our paychecks now because it looks amazing ! The beauty world has been abuzz over all things glitter and rainbow for months now , so it makes sense that Jerrod would add Too Faced’s fun and flirty touch to the mix.
We don’t have any information on when Too Faced’s Glitter Bomb Palette is coming out, but we will happily lap up these teases to tide us over til we get the full scoop!
#sneakypeek GLITTER ✨⭐️ #toofaced 
A post shared by Jerrod Blandino (@jerrodblandino) on Mar 7, 2017 at 3:31pm PST 
Jerrod, this is just rude. We need more!
This Glitter Bomb Palette appears to have ten vibrant shades, and from the photo, the consistency appears to be creamy and super vibrant! We love it!
#SneakPeek NEW! By @toofaced 1. #GlitterBomb - ✨ A Glitter Palette 2, #MeltedLatex NEW #Lipsticks 3. And a unicorn packaging in the background #ComingSoon *we will keep u updated What are your thoughts? #TRENDMOOD #TooFaced pic: @mianne.chan THANK U for this fabulous update: @jenna.jenny #instamakeup #instabeauty #beauty #beautyaddict #cosmetics #bbloggers #bblogger #beautyaddict #beautyblog #beautycare #makeupart #makeupartist #makeupblogger #makeupobsessed #wakeupandmakeup #maquillaje #fashion 
A post shared by TRENDMOOD (@trendmood1) on Mar 22, 2017 at 4:43pm PDT 
And can we get a YASSSS for including the white and black shades? This palette is going to bring the DRAMA, y’all!
It looks like the Glitter Bomb Palette might be released around the same time as some new Melted Matte lipstick shades, which just adds to our thrill and anticipation.
Look at what @hotfiremakeup spotted in this @toofaced #glitterbomb palette SNEAK PEAK , NEW #meltedlatex liquid lipsticks and a little #unicorn Tin that could be another palette. #toofacedcosmetics is launching a #unicorntears collection, could the tin br part of the collection? Will keep you posted on these #melted #latex finishes and #unicorn goodies. Thanks @hotfiremakeup for the tag. Follow me to get all the latest beauty / makeup Sneak Peaks, Launches, Restocks , and reviews. Happy Shopping!!! Repost pic @hotfiremakeup Pic @mianne.chan #beautyfxbyceleste#beautyfx#beauty#makeupjunkie#makeupaddict#makeupjunkies#makeupaddiction#makeupblogger#beautyblogger#instablogger #ilovemakeup #makeupmafia #slave2beauty#wakeupandmakeup#ilovemakeup#makeupobsessed#bloglife#bloggerlife#toofacedglitterbomb#glitterbomb#toofaced 
A post shared by "Illuminate and shine" (@beautyfxbyceleste) on Mar 22, 2017 at 5:54pm PDT 
We’ve passed on.
Keep your eyes trained like a viper on Too Faced’s social media accounts for more updates and info on this new Glitter Bomb Palette as well as any other new releases that might be headed our way. Knowing Jerrod and his team, there’s likely several announcements headed our way — not that our little hearts can take it!
